content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = split(String(md), '\n'))
    
    code_blocks = []
    current_block = ""

    for line in lines
        if startswith(line, "```julia"))
            push!(code_blocks, current_block)
            current_block = ""
        else
            append!(current_block, " $(line) "))
        end
    end

    push!(code_blocks, current_block)
    joined_code_blocks = "\n\n".join(code_blocks)

    return joined_code_blocks
end
```
This function `extract_julia_code` takes a markdown document `md` as input. It processes the lines of the markdown and extracts all code blocks in Julia format. The code blocks are then joined together with newlines before being returned as a single string.
